Text: Confirm Address for Tax ReturnsHi Geoff Could you please confirm that your Windsor address is to be used on your tax returns Also would you like your completed tax package sent to this address We will be sending out your returns as soon as possible Thanks Vicki Meszaros PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP Phone Fax The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

Tax PackagePST Hello I am putting your tax package together Could you please provide me with the phone number for your Windsor address for the courier company Your tax equalization will be prepared in Houston so I cannot provide you with the Enron figures however your Canadian return is nil no refund nor balance owing and your US return shows a refund Regards Vicki on AM To Vicki L mericasCA cc Subject RE Confirm Address for Tax Returns Yes Windsor Houston TX Send it there Whats my tally And what is Enron going to reimburse geof Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESCvickiElEmeszaroscaEpwcglobalEcomE NRONcom Sent Tuesday June AM To Subject Confirm Address for Tax Returns Hi Geoff Could you please confirm that your Windsor address is to be used on your tax returns Also would you like your completed tax package sent to this address We will be sending out your returns as soon as possible Thanks Vicki Meszaros PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP Phone Fax The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

Tax Return QuestionsPST Hi Geoff I know that you are busy so I will send you an email instead of trying to reach you by phone Just a few quick questions for you Box Code C for on your W is this your donation to the United Way Please confirm that you donated to the German Shephard Dog Rescue and paid at closing for real estate taxes I just want to make sure that it is a coincidence that these amounts are the same and not a typing error Please confirm that you paid for your Tibco International Inc shares and sold at and paid for your Nasdaq shares and sold at both sold at a loss Thank you kindly Vicki Meszaros PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP Phone Fax The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

Stock PurchasesPST Oops another outstanding item Could you please provide me with the date of purchase of your Tibco and Nasdaq shares You gave me the cost per our phonecall but I forgot to get the acquisition dates from you Thanks Vicki Forwarded by Vicki L MeszarosCATLSPwC on AM Vicki L Meszaros AM To cc Subject Charitable donations Hi Geoff I have not received your list of charitable donations Please send fax to me as soon as possible so that I may finalize your US return Thanks so much Vicki Meszaros PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP Phone Fax The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

Tax ReturnsPST Hi Geoff I am preparing your US return and have a few questions for you Could you please tell me if you paid property taxes or made charitable donations during and if so please provide me with the details and amounts Also you sold shares in Tibco Software Inc and Nasdaq shares I will need the cost basispurchase price that was paid for acquiring those shares so that I may calculate a gain or loss on disposition Thanks so much Vicki Meszaros PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP Phone Fax The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer
